author: franzoni
body:
- skipBadFiles flag implemented. Needed to use the DQMIO in production. includes #2406 from Deguio
- change to the validation matrix to deploy DQMIO in production; this has no impact on the IB's, only on worfklows submissions
title: From cmssw 7 0 0 pre13 skip bad files and matrix dqmio
